  • Method Details

    • tryAcquirePermit

      boolean tryAcquirePermit(int units)
      Try to acquire permit for the given rcu. Will not block if permit is not available.
      Parameters:
      units - Number of units to acquire.
      Returns:
      true if permit is acquired, false otherwise.
